segments.text: Come on in . I am so glad you are here . We have been expecting you .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Am I late for the party ? Looks everyone is already here . Hope I didn ’ t miss something interesting .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: No , you are just on time . We haven ’ t really started yet .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Great , here are some flowers for you . I hope you like them . I was not sure if the color will suit your new apartment .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Thank you , they ’ re beautiful . You can hang your coat over there . Try this new couch , it is so comfortable . You will love it . Want something to drink , tea , coffee , juice or Cola ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Don ’ t bother . I will help myself .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: It is such a nice place .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Well , I don ’ t mean to boast but all the designs are done by myself and some colleagues are already trying to copy some of them for their new apartments . Look , they are making photos now of my designed kitchen .
segments.speaker: S1
